isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built After 05/19/2003 - CHASSIS FEATURES - REMOTE AIR SOLENOID MODULE (7-PACK) - TESTING INDIVIDUAL SOLENOIDS

svcproc.title: TESTING INDIVIDUAL SOLENOIDS
svcproc.para: After an Individual solenoid has been removed from the module, it can be tested by applying 12 volts (or a 9 volt battery) across the solenoid terminals. The solenoid should engage and air should pass or be blocked (depending on the type of solenoid) to the passages in the sides of the solenoid when it is applied to the port on the face of the solenoid.
If the solenoid checks good and trouble codes identifying problems with the solenoid are present after cycling the key, the RASM may need replaced.
